Reviews.Title: This camera is great!
Reviews.Author: JustSteve
Reviews.Content: I use this camera all the time for my car hobby, my radio control helicopter events, and everything else I do. It's great, takes great photos, and it's easy to use. I have had mine for over two years with no problems at all. I like it so much I just bought one for my Mom's birthday a few weeks ago. Steve

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced Face Detection of up to 16 persons for perfectly focused and exposed faces plus correct exposure of other image areas
Dimensions (W x H x D): 92.7 x 55.8 x 24.7 mm
Weight: 107 g (without battery and card)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-5020 12MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (white)
